long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Content Simplifier: Make Complex Text Easy to Understand

Instantly simplify any selected text on a webpage. Perfect for students, non-native speakers, or anyone looking to quickly grasp complex content (also because the overcomplicated speech is widespread in health, legal, finance and marketing).

Key Features:
• One-click simplification of selected text
• Maintains original formatting
• Adds brief explanations for complex words
• Works on any webpage
• Daily usage limit of 20 simplifications (upgrade available for unlimited use)

Powered by Bencium.

Note: This extension requires an internet connection to function.
